TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but it's only the size of a thimble.

I wish my stupid online chemistry homework would make more sense.

Granted, but now you live in a world where sense is frowned upon.

 

I wish thathathtahthahhthahthhahthahtahthhtahtahtahtahthathathahtahthathathathahthahthatht I didn'didn'didn'didn't just begingingingingin to cra a a a a a a a a a a shhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh.......

wat

I wish sleep was unneccesary

You now work 18 hours a day

I wish I could fly

You can, but:

I wish to be Doctor Who.

You are now a MD with recurring amnesia. 

I wish for world peas

Spoiler

(deliberate misspelling)

Granted. Go and download the Boris planet pack, and my patch to it, and among the new celestial bodies is World Peas, AKA Peabody.

I wish for wold peace.

Granted.

Aliens then invade.

I wish we had a better election.

Granted. We finally get rid of FPTP voting as well.

 

I wish the forum wasn't so distracting.

Gran-OH LOOK A THREAD ABOUT SQUIRRELS!

I wish I didn't have pins and needles.

Granted. You have needles and pins.

I wish my phone had more than 1% of battery.

Granted. You now have 1.1% of battery. 

I wish that I could dance

Granted, you can only dab or whatever these kids are doing these days.

I wish for one more rep.

Granted. For now...

I wish I could think of a wish.

Granted! The wish you think of is to be wish to be unable to think of a wish.

I wish for the ability to steal wishes.

Granted, but you can only steal wishes that cause you harm.

I wish for more downloads on XKOM.

Edited September 13, 2016 by njmksr

Granted, but they're from people who get mixed up and think it's a Kerbals mod to XCOM, and then hurl abuse at you when they can't make it work.

I wish to be unable to think of a wish.

Granted, now andlythling can hadplen!

 

I wish that my posts weren't a continuous stream of references.

Granted. They are now 9gag memes

 

I wish... I wish...

I wish... for a fish

For I wish for a fish and a dish for the fish.

Granted. You have been fish-slapped and dish-slapped.

I wish that I could start a meme

Granted. It's the nutshack

I wish for B9 to remodel the starting KSC models

Granted. But advanced buildings and planets become Porkjet's inflatables.

Edit: oops... That works!

 

I wish Eve not purple.

Edited September 15, 2016 by kerbiloid

Granted, but now it's on fire.

I wish Mordin's death scene in Mass Effect 3 wasn't so sad...
It turns out I have feelings

Granted. Mordin steals your money, kicks your sitting part and calls your home animal "an ugly thing". You are not sad when he dies.

I wish Moira Brown live in Diamond City.

On 9/15/2016 at 2:25 PM, kerbiloid said:

Granted. Mordin steals your money, kicks your sitting part and calls your home animal "an ugly thing". You are not sad when he dies.

I wish Moira Brown live in Diamond City.

Granted, but you'll have to help her make her Wasteland Survival Guide every time you go see her.

I wish for an exceedingly rare hat.
